channel.title: Medical research
channel.description:
This series explores current developments in research in the fields of the behavioral sciences and medicine.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Diabetes, part 1
item.description: This program, the first of two parts, focuses on diabetes and its treatment methods. Guests are F.D.W. Lukens, MD; Garfield G. Duncan, MD; and Randall G. Sprague, MD.
item.dc:creator: Phillips, Glen
item.dc:subject: NAEB Regions III & IV: The Upper Midwest

item.title: Tuberculosis, part 2
item.description: This program, the second of three parts, focuses on tuberculosis and its treatment methods. Guests are Julius L. Wilson, MD; Sol Roy Rosenthal, MD, Ph.D.; and Floyd M. Feldman, MD.
item.dc:creator: Phillips, Glen
item.dc:subject: Tuberculosis

item.title: Surgery for heart disease, part 3
item.description: This program, the third of three parts, focuses on techniques in surgery for heart disease. Guests are Denton A. Cooley, MD; Willis J. Potts, MD; John H. Gibbon Jr., MD; C. Walton Lillehei, MD
item.dc:creator: Phillips, Glen
item.dc:subject: NAEB Regions III & IV: The Upper Midwest

item.title: Leukemia
item.description: This program focuses on leukemia and how it is treated. Guests include Joseph M. Hill, MD; John H. Gibbon, Jr, MD; and John F. Enders, MD.
item.dc:creator: Phillips, Glen
item.dc:subject: NAEB Regions III & IV: The Upper Midwest

item.title: Hypertension and hypotension
item.description: In this program, Dr. Harriet P. Dustan, MD discusses hypertension and hypotension.
item.dc:creator: Phillips, Glen
item.dc:subject: NAEB Regions III & IV: The Upper Midwest

item.description: This program, the second of three parts, focuses on tuberculosis and its treatment methods. Guests are Julius L. Wilson, MD; Sol Roy Rosenthal, MD, Ph.D.; and Floyd M. Feldman, MD.
item.dc:creator: Phillips, Glen
item.dc:subject: Tuberculosis

item.title: Surgery for Heart Disease, part 2
item.description: This program, the second of three parts, focuses on techniques in surgery for heart disease. Guests are Denton A. Cooley, MD; and W.C. Sealy, MD.
item.dc:creator: University of Michigan
item.dc:subject: NAEB Regions III & IV: The Upper Midwest

item.title: Viruses
item.description: This program focuses on viruses and the study of them. Guests are John F. Enders, MD and Jerome T. Syverton, MD.
item.dc:creator: Phillips, Glen
item.dc:subject: Viruses

item.title: Hypertension and hypotension
item.description: In this program, Dr. Harriet P. Dustan, MD discusses hypertension and hypotension.
item.dc:creator: Phillips, Glen
item.dc:subject: NAEB Regions III & IV: The Upper Midwest

item.title: The public and communication in medical research
item.description: This program focuses on the public and communication in medical research. Guests are Harry Levinson, Ph.D; Leonard J. Duhl, MD; Robert H. Felix, MD; Denton A. Cooley, MD; W.C. Sealy, MD; Sol Roy Rosenthal, MD, Ph.D; and others.
item.dc:creator: Phillips, Glen
item.dc:subject: NAEB Regions III & IV: The Upper Midwest

item.title: Neurological and muscular disease
item.description: This program focuses on neurological and muscular disease, as well as treatments for them. Guests are Hans H. Reese, MD; Francis M. Forster, MD; Roger J. Williams, Ph.D; J. Morrison Brady, MD; and Ade T. Milhorat, MD.
item.dc:creator: Phillips, Glen
item.dc:subject: NAEB Regions III & IV: The Upper Midwest
